properties.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Northern Elko County
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 9 at 6:02AM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
A weather disturbance is bringing snow showers to northern
Nevada. These snow showers are moving steadily east so significant
accumulation is not expected. However, snow intensity will be
moderate to heavy at times causing reductions in visibility and
rapidly changing road conditions that will impact morning
commuters and travelers, including the I-80 corridor. Snow
showers are expected to diminish later today.

Motorists should use caution when approaching these snow showers,
as road conditions will quickly become slick, along with
reductions in visibility.

Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

NWSheadline: Snow showers moving through northern Nevada
